pr_title: Interval statistics: show unit in dropdown.

timeline.message: Interval statistics: show unit in dropdown.
Interval statistics: show unit in dropdown.

timeline.bodyText: Only for curiosity: why do you use "" + value instead of String.valueOf(value)? Is it just a preference of syntax or a question of performance?
timeline.author: rgmf

replies.bodyText: It just look simpler (to me). I hope that the generated bytecode is the same.
replies.author: dennisguse

replies.bodyText: Thank you @dennisguse for the clarification. I understand, yes it's more simple 👍
replies.author: rgmf

timeline.message: Interval statistics: show unit also in dropdown.
